challenges.title: Alarm Clock
challenges.description: Start a stopwatch and have one team member count to 30 seconds without assistance. If the stopwatch is within 1 second of 30 seconds when they stop, you succeed. Otherwise, you must restart.

challenges.title: Six Feet Under
challenges.description: Travel downwards using an elevator.

challenges.title: Two Birds One Stone
challenges.description: Find and capture two birds in the same photo. The birds do not have to be real live birds. You may not produce any images of birds yourself.

challenges.title: Big Bad Wolf
challenges.description: Create a free-standing structure with a minimum of 6 sticks, then topple it using only your breath.

challenges.title: Anagrams
challenges.description:
Roll a die. Using the corresponding set of letters, create 15 unique words. You may not use a letter more than once per word, and you may not attempt this challenge while moving.

1. F I E S T A       	4) D E C O Y S
2. C E A S E D     	5) A C C E N T
3. S T I N K Y	6) A R C A N E

challenges.title: Day Clubbing
challenges.description: Find a poster advertising one of UBC's clubs, and advertise the club to the camera for 30 seconds.

challenges.title: Critter Companion
challenges.description:
Find 3 bugs and become friends with them.

For each bug, you must capture it on camera, introduce yourselves to the bug, and finally give it a name.

challenges.title: Flamingo
challenges.description: Both team members must stand still on one foot, without support, for 90 seconds non-stop.

challenges.title: Piggyback
challenges.description: One team member must piggyback another team member for 100 steps. You may switch who is piggybacking at any time.

challenges.title: Media Marketing
challenges.description: Create a 30 second video advertising one of UBC’s faculties in front its respective building. At least 25 seconds of the video must include speaking.

challenges.title: Stay in Shape
challenges.description:
Roll a die 5 times. For every roll, all team members must complete the exercise indicated by the die:
1: 10 push-ups
2: 20 jumping jacks
3: 10 jump squats
4: 20 mountain climbers
5: 20 high knees
6: 10 half-burpees

challenges.title: Perimeter Patrol
challenges.description: Travel around the entire perimeter of a building on foot.

challenges.title: Spitting Bars
challenges.description:
Have one team member rap “The Church of Bobandy” at full speed with the original track in the background.

You must successfully memorize and rap at least 3 verses without mistakes in lyrics or timing.

challenges.title: Acting School
challenges.description:
Play 10 successful rounds of Charades. You may skip a word for any reason, however if more than 3 skips are used this challenge is vetoed.

Generate words using this website, on medium difficulty: [itsgamenight.com/charades-generator/](https://itsgamenight.com/charades-generator/)

challenges.title: Dicey Deed
challenges.description: Roll a die. Visit the number of public trash cans indicated on the die and dispose something in each one.

challenges.title: Bracket City
challenges.description:
Play The Atlantic Times’s "Bracket City" game. You must get a score above 50, otherwise this challenge is automatically vetoed.

You may not look up answers, and you may not move while attempting this challenge.

challenges.title: Crafty Connections
challenges.description:
Play The New York Times’s "Connections" game. Each set of words your team gets correct awards 4 tokens. You may not move or take transit while attempting this challenge.

Reward: [# correct word sets] × 4 Tokens

challenges.title: Hammertime!
challenges.description: Find and touch 5 stop signs.

challenges.title: Morse Message
challenges.description:
Use a Morse Code chart.

Have one team member walk 50 steps away, generate a random 5 letter word, then broadcast it in Morse Code using their phone’s flashlight.

The other team member must correctly decode the word to complete the challenge.

If you fail, generate a new word and try again.

challenges.title: Cheapo
challenges.description: Purchase an item that costs $3 or less from a retailer or vending machine.

challenges.title: Parking Police
challenges.description: Find a car parked on a line, in a no parking zone, or in an accessibility space (without a permit).

challenges.title: Ample Parking
challenges.description: Find a parking lot with at least 5 adjacent empty spaces in a straight line.

challenges.title: Bottle Flipper
challenges.description: Acquire a disposable plastic bottle. Using this bottle, successfully perform a bottle flip.

challenges.title: Dry Out
challenges.description: Have a team member get their hands wet, then wait until they are fully dry.

challenges.title: You Are Here
challenges.description: Find a physical map/directory and point our your current location on that map.

challenges.title: Quality Control
challenges.description: Find a marked location on Google Maps that’s rated less than 4.3 stars and take a selfie in front of it. You may not rate any location yourself to fulfill the star requirement.

challenges.title: Paper Racer
challenges.description: Acquire paper (or any thin, paper-like material) and construct a paper airplane.

challenges.title: Letter List
challenges.description: Go to any retail establishment. Find and list 16 products that start with different letters of the alphabet.

challenges.title: Bookworm
challenges.description: Find books in a store or library whose authors' initials match each team member’s initials. (For example, John Doe must find a book written by someone with the initials “J.D.”.)

challenges.title: Crewmate's Study
challenges.description: Find a book that contains the word “suspicious“, “among”, or “impostor”. The book’s title does not count.

curses.title: Christmas Cheer
curses.description: All team members must sing a Christmas carol together out loud for 3 minutes.

curses.title: Touch Grass
curses.description: You have 3 minutes to touch grass. If you fail, your team is frozen for 3 minutes.

curses.title: What's the Wordle
curses.description: Attempt today’s Wordle. The number of guesses your team makes on the Wordle equals the amount of minutes you are frozen for.

curses.title: Wet Floor
curses.description: You may not run for the next 25 minutes.

curses.title: Caddy at Capacity
curses.description:
For the next 10 minutes, one team member must carry all team members’ belongings, while the other team members may not carry anything except their phone.

(Season 1 Challenge)

curses.title: Lockdown
curses.description: If Hiders are in a building, they are locked inside for 10 minutes.

curses.title: Freeze!
curses.description: The Hiders are frozen for 3 minutes.

curses.title: Blindfold
curses.description: One team member is blindfolded for 10 minutes.

curses.title: Vitamin D
curses.description: Hiders must stay outside for ten minutes.

curses.title: Ransom
curses.description: Hiders must visit the fountain before they are found, or else they are penalized 5 minutes
